title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4056.3 - When horse run as entry
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4056.3 - When horse run as entry

State Regulations

No person may have any form of interest as owner, part
owner or lessee in different horses running in the same race unless run as an
entry. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4056.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
